activities:
Access Marketing & Communications LLC may receive personal information from our customers, suppliers, or other business
partners as they use our hosted technology platform. In this instance, we act only as a storage and service provider, without
any interest in or knowledge about the personal information being stored. We collect and use personal information for the
purposes of providing services to our customers, processing personal information on behalf of customers, communicating
with corporate business partners about business matters, providing information on our services, and conducting related
tasks for legitimate business purposes.
